$meta.__comment: Using null element to signal 'et al' in the array below. Don't do this for your own localization.

erase.tooltip: Hold Control and Shift to erase colors

reset.tooltip: Hold Control and Shift to reset colors to their default values

categories.placeholderText: Categories will be added after bones are displayed once

selectBehavior.__comment: Below key is not yet inserted.
selectBehavior.title: Selection Behavior
selectBehavior.disableLeftClickTarget: Disable changing target with left click
selectBehavior.disableRightClickTarget: Disable changing target with right click

assignByKeyPress.title: Pressing Keys
assignByKeyPress.helpText:
To assign a key or key combination:
1. Hold the key or key combination
2. Click on the desired action

Do not hold any key to unassign.

generic.__comment: These are used for category keybindings. (Likely to be replaced with a placeholder system in future)

references.title: References
references.explanation: Overlay reference images onto your game, helping you to get just the right pose.

dialog.title: Add reference file
dialog.__comment: The previous translation files included the actual technical file filter here as well, which is... dangerous.

glamourDresser.__comment: These are currently a little messy... need placeholder system to fix this.

sync.tooltip:
Refresh Glamour Plate memory for the Sets lookups.
This memory is kept after a restart.

Requirements:
 One of these windows must be opened: "Glamour Plate Creation" (by the Glamour Dresser) or "Plate Selection" (by the Glamour Plate skill).

dispose.tooltip: Dispose of the Glamour Plates memory and remove configurations for ALL characters.
